channel.title: Mariela M. Villarreal
channel.description: Recent content on Mariela M. Villarreal

item.title: Fun (?) Facts About Me
item.description: Here are some fun facts about me! Who am I? Height: 5'1" Hometown: Laredo, Texas I was a swimmer in high school. My events were the 500 m freestyle and the 100 m backstroke. If I had three wishes, I would wish for the chance to go back in time and see Prince in concert, to have a pet sloth, and have to infinitely more wishes. Favorites: Favorite Song: "De Do Do Do, De Da Da Da" by The Police

item.title: My First Blog Post!!
item.description: Hello!! This is my first official blog post, and I am going to use it to show off a little bit. Throughout this class, I learned how to use R, and I loved it. Towards, the end of class, we learned Python. Although, I personally enjoy R more than Python, we can actually use both of these programs at the same time, which is awesome! In the R chuck below, I'm going to be maniupulating some data from the "movies6" dataset from my second project.

item.title: Project 1: Exploratory Data Analysis
item.description: Netflix in All Kinds of Weather Introduction For my project, I was interested in seeing if my Netflix watching habits were affected in the weather in Laredo, TX (my hometown). The weather in Laredo is pretty predictable; it's usually hot, and it rains every once in a while. I wasn't sure which results I could expect to find, but I knew that I would probably watch TV with greater frequency when it was hotter outside.

item.title: Project 2: Modeling, Testing, and Predicting
item.description: What Makes a Good Movie? With this project, I sought to continue with the theme of my first project: movies. I found a great dataset containing the information for over 58,000 movies listed on IMDb (the internet movie database). For each movie, the title, length of the movie (in minutes), year it was made, budget (in US dollars), IMDb rating (on a scale of 1-10, with 10 being the highest rated movie), total user votes for that movie, other rating information, mpaa rating (PG, PG-13, R or NC-17) and genre were given.

item.title: Projects
item.description: Check out some of my coding projects below: Wrangling & Exploratory Data Analysis Modeling, Inference, Prediction --
